revision.comment: Notification of altered sources needing review #IABot (v1.2.6)
revision.text: {{WPMILHIST |class = B|British=yes|WWI=yes|German=yes|Australian=yes|Canadian=yes |B-Class-1= yes |B-Class-2= yes |B-Class-3= yes |B-Class-4= yes |B-Class-5= yes }} {{WikiProject Germany|class=B|importance=low|b1=y|b2=y|b3=y|b4=y|b5=y}} == Expansion == Added material and moved the revision to the article page; the Fourth and 1st army sections and the analysis and casualties sections remain to be added and the lead to be finished (tomorrow if poss). [[User:Keith-264|Keith-264]] ([[User talk:Keith-264|talk]]) 19:39, 9 August 2015 (UTC) :Having thought it would be a relatively short article due to the number of weather postponements, as Topsy said, "it just growed". The analysis needs rewriting according to theme rather than writer to reduce overlaps and the lead isn't good enough.[[User:Keith-264|Keith-264]] ([[User talk:Keith-264|talk]]) 14:18, 22 August 2015 (UTC) == External links modified == Hello fellow Wikipedians, I have just modified {{plural:1|one external link|1 external links}} on [[Battle of Le Transloy]]. Please take a moment to review [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?diff=prev&oldid=746652680 my edit]. If you have any questions, or need the bot to ignore the links, or the page altogether, please visit [[User:Cyberpower678/FaQs#InternetArchiveBot|this simple FaQ]] for additional information. I made the following changes: *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20121020091747/http://www.cwgc.org/somme/content.asp?menuid=30&id=30&menuname=Le%20Transloy&menu=main to http://www.cwgc.org/somme/content.asp?menuid=30&id=30&menuname=Le%20Transloy&menu=main When you have finished reviewing my changes, please set the ''checked'' parameter below to '''true''' or '''failed''' to let others know (documentation at {{tlx|Sourcecheck}}). {{sourcecheck|checked=false}} Cheers.â€”[[User:InternetArchiveBot|'''InternetArchiveBot''']] ([[User talk:InternetArchiveBot|Report bug]]) 18:17, 28 October 2016 (UTC)
